channel.title: Battlefield 3 premium
channel.description:
NEVERMIND, I NEEDED TO DOWNLOAD THE MAP PACKS EITHER, CLOSE PLEASE.
Hi.
I bought Battlefield 3 ( normal ), and 2 weeks later ( today ) i bought premium pack, with 4200 microsoft points, i installed the points, redeemed code etc, but i cant play the maps?
I got entrance to premium sides etc, but not the maps, What i need to do..?
